overview_of_class:
Overview of class

Biological foundations of speech and music. Topics include auditory system neuroanatomy and physiology, acoustics of speech and music, sound processing in the brain, cognitive, motor and reward influences on sound processing, and how auditory processing is enhanced in auditory experts (musicians/bilinguals) and impaired in populations with listening challenges.


Registration Requirements: Juniors, Seniors and Grad Students only.
.
name: Biological Foundations of Speech and Music
title: SoC CSD 310-0-20 Biological Foundations of Speech and Music
